snippet.title: RAGE 2 -Rise of the Ghosts Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise of The Ghosts expansion is out now! 

The Ghosts may have just been a wasteland folktale, but not anymore. They’re real and so are their plans for domination. Armed with nanotrite abilities and led by the fearsome Iris, the Ghosts are dangerous enemies. Navigate the Overgrown City, a huge new region, and put a stop to their uprising. 

Inclusions:
• New Story 
• New Enemy Faction- Ghosts
• New Weapon- Feltrite Laser Launcher
• New Ability- Void
• Huge New Region to Explore 

Purchase the DLC through the in-game store.

https://www.xbox.com/games/rage-2

ESRB RATING: Mature with Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language and Suggestive Themes
